overview: From Animal House to Revenge of the Nerds, movies about amorous college students have attained an iconic pop culture status. But our fascination with sultry students and scholastic sex is about to be taken to a radical new level in Burning Angel Entertainments Jessie Lee Goes to College. An original tale of sex, studies, and the challenges of being a female entrepreneur in a male-dominated world, this timely comedy offsets its witty and accomplished storyline with strong performances and a multitude of rich and varied sexual encounters.
tagline: The world has never seen a student body like this!
title: Jessie Lee Goes to College
